channel.title: Object Issues (Slayer Staircases)
channel.description:
My source is (Shards) Project no-Doze. I added all the slayer chains to climb up the floors and it works perfectly. But, The staircases will not work...
I have added the ObjectConstants: [CODE]SLAYER_STAIRCASE_UP = 4387;[/CODE] & [CODE]public int[][] objectCommander = { { 4387, SLAYER_STAIRCASE_UP, 1, 500}, [/CODE]
I have added the ObjectController: [CODE]case ObjectConstants.SLAYER_STAIRCASE_UP: Location.addNewRequest(client, 3433, 3537, 1, 3); break;[/CODE]
When I click the staircase it does not do anything. I change the object to a 1 tile portal and it works fine. So, My issue is how could I make the staircase work as it is larger than 1 tile?
Appreciate any help!
